item.title: Kyoto Yura Hotel Nijo Jo Bettei MGallery is poised to transform into a secret retreat in Kyoto
item.description: Source: Accor. Interior, Kyoto Yura Hotel Nijo Jo Bettei MGallery. Accor has expanded its presence in Japan with the launch of its second MGallery Hotel, the Kyoto Yura Hotel Nijo Jo Bettei MGallery. This Kyoto-based hotel, designed by architect Yukio Hashimoto, centers around a Japanese garden, providing a sophisticated experience of the changing seasons. Hashimoto’s design prioritizes creating a specific atmosphere over focusing solely on materials, resulting in a minimalist and timeless aesthetic.
